newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - Omega Healthcare FFO upped.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - Omega Healthcare FFO upped.

text.p: -- EVEREN Securities Inc said Friday it increased its estimate of Omega Healthcare Investors Inc's funds from operations (FFO) for fiscal 1997 to $3.03 and its estimate for fiscal 1998 to $3.21. Both estimates were raised by $0.01, EVEREN said.
-- EVEREN said it believes the company and its shareholders are better served by a recent increase in Omega Healthcare's annual dividend to $2.58 from $2.48.
-- Omega Healthcare's investment pipeline remains strong, allowing the company to raise its investment targets to $100 million to $110 million, up from $70 million to $80 million, EVEREN said.
-- Omega Healthcare owns, leases and provides mortgage financing secured by income producing health care facilities.
-- Its shares closed up 1/8 Friday at 31-3/4.
